name: Role Aboard
description:
You are on the Deep Intergalactic Crew Enterprise (DICE), a space vessel with 3 souls aboard. Roll a dice to figure which "Role", or crew member you will be assigned to play: Mechanic, Pilot, or Engineer.  It's up to you to safe the ship from destruction by completing the essential tasks given to you!

Mechanic

She must collect all the fuel canisters around the ship to energize the engine.

Pilot

Their job is to clear the path of asteroids that lie between your ship and the exit warp gate.

Engineer

His job is to connect the cables to the conduit in order to power up the shielding system.

This game was made for the GMTK 2022 Gamejam with the given theme of "Roll Of The DIe".

Controls:

WASD to move around

Hit "F" to interact.

Credits:
